name: Buddy & Fluffy
description:
Help Buddy rescue his little cat  Fluffy from the evil forest.

Use your WASD or arrow keys to move around the map. Don't stand too much time on a tile or it will break! Be careful from the traps!

This is our first  LowRezJam and it was a blast! We did have some problems along the way with the resolution restrictions and life also came on the way so we couldn't create a longer game.

We hope you enjoy it!
